EmailTemplate.subject: Fuel rebates up to 5-cents per gallon
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Many businesses save hundreds of dollars using ExxonMobil's volume-based fuel rebates.
"Everybody wants to have cheaper fuel. But on top of my rebate, my invoice is easy to understand, and my drivers hardly ever have a problem using the cards. Everything on this program has worked well for me."
Paul McGuire General Superintendent, Farmer & Irwin Corp.
How much could your business save?
REBATE STRUCTURE 0 - 499 gallons per billing period; 0.0¢ rebate 500 - 1,499 gallons per billing period; 1.5¢ rebate 1,500 - 3,999 gallons per billing period; 2.0¢ rebate 4,000 - 6,999 gallons per billing period; 3.0¢ rebate 7,000 - 9,999 gallos per billing period; 4.0¢ rebate 10,000+ gallons per billing period; 5.0¢ rebate
Please contact your personal sales representative: {!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} {!User.Phone} {!User.Email}
* Rebates issued if payment is made in accordance with the terms of the ExxonMobil Fleet Charge Account Agreement. Rebates may not be allowed where prohibited by law and apply only to fuel purchases made with the ExxonMobil Fleet Card at participating Exxon and Mobil branded locations in the U.S. Rebates are not applied at time of purchase — they will appear as an account credit on the same billing statement with your monthly purchases. Please contact ExxonMobil Fleet Services for further information on available rebates. Rebates can be changed at any time at ExxonMobil's discretion.
**The ExxonMobil Fleet Card fees are applicable under the No Fees Promotion. The $50.00 standard account set-up fee and $10.00 standard monthly account fee is waived for fleets that are approved or apply for credit in 2014.
